array.string: Increases ranged and tech critical chance by 2%.
Increases ranged and tech critical chance by 4%.
Increases ranged and tech critical chance by 6%.
Reduces the activation time of Medical Probe by 0.25 seconds and reduces the cooldown of Advanced Medical Probe by 1.5 seconds.
Reduces the activation time of Medical Probe by 0.5 seconds and reduces the cooldown of Advanced Medical Probe by 3 seconds.
Recharge Cells now immediately recharges 1 additional cell.
Recharge Cells now immediately recharges 2 additional cell.
Critical results with damage and healing abilities have a 50% chance to grant First Responder, increasing alacrity by 5% for 6 seconds.
Critical results with damage and healing abilities have a 100% chance to grant First Responder, increasing alacrity by 5% for 6 seconds.

Converts 30 charges of Combat Support Cell to supercharge you blaster, restoring 2 energy cells and increasing all damage and healing dealt by 10% for 10 seconds. While active, the following abilities gain Supercharge effects: Charged Bolts: Cost reduced by 2. Full Auto: Cost reduced by 1. Advanced Medical Probe: Cooldown reduced by 100%. Kolto Bomb: Places a shield on all targets reducing damage taken by 10% for 15 seconds.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 35% and reduces the threat generated by healing abilities by 5%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating healing abilities by 70% and reduces the threat generated by healing abilities by 10%.
Increases the healing done by Medical Probe and Advanced Medical Probe by 3%. In addition, Medical Probe builds 3 charges of Combat Support Cell.
Increases the healing done by Medical Probe and Advanced Medical Probe by 6%. In addition, Medical Probe builds 6 charges of Combat Support Cell.
Reactive Shield now further decreases ability activation pushback by 30% and makes you immune to interrupts.
Lobs a kolto bomb at the target area, exploding on impact. Heals up to 3 allies within 8 meters of the targeted area for 95 - 206.
Kolto Bomb has a 50% chance to leave Kolto Residue on affected targets, increasing all healing received by 5% for 15 seconds.
Kolto Bomb has a 100% chance to leave Kolto Residue on affected targets, increasing all healing received by 5% for 15 seconds.
Reduces the cost of Concussion Charge, Concussive Round and Cryo Grenade by 1.
Increase all healing received by 10% while Reactive Shield is active.
Increase all healing received by 20% while Reactive Shield is active.
Advanced Medical Probe has a 33.34% chance to reduce the cost of your next Medical Probe by 2.
Advanced Medical Probe has a 66.68% chance to reduce the cost of your next Medical Probe by 2.
Advanced Medical Probe has a 100% chance to reduce the cost of your next Medical Probe by 2.
Reduces all damage taken by 2% while Combat Support Cell is active.
Reduces all damage taken by 4% while Combat Support Cell is active.
Reduces the cost of Field Aid by 1. In addition, Field Aid now removes negative mental effects.

Deploys a trauma probe with 10 charges that lasts 5 minutes. When the target is damaged, Trauma Probe loses 1 charge and heals the target for 61 - 72. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds. Only one trauma probe can be deployed at a time.
Advanced Medical Probe has a 50% chance to apply Preventative Medicine to the target, healing for an additional ? over 9 seconds.
Advanced Medical Probe has a 100% chance to apply Preventative Medicine to the target, healing for an additional ? over 9 seconds.
Preventative Medicine now also provides 10% armor while active.
Increase the critical healing bonus of all heals by 3%.
Increase the critical healing bonus of all heals by 6%.
Increase the critical healing bonus of all heals by 9%.
Increase the critical healing bonus of all heals by 12%.
Increase the critical healing bonus of all heals by 15%.
Instantly heals a friendly target for 234 - 401.
Increase healing received by 1% and all healing done by 1%.
Increase healing received by 2% and all healing done by 2%.
Increase the damage dealt by all rounds and Charged Bolts by 3% and increases the healing dealt by Kolto Bomb by 10%.
Increase the damage dealt by all rounds and Charged Bolts by 6% and increases the healing dealt by Kolto Bomb by 20%.
Increase Endurance by 1% and all healing received by 3%.
Increase Endurance by 2% and all healing received by 6%.

Increase the effect of your cells while they are active: Plasma Cell: Increases tech critical chance by 3%. Armor Piercing Cell: Reduces the cost of High Impact Bolt by 1. Combat Support Cell: Increases tech critical hit chance by 3%.
Reduces the cost of Charged Bolts and Grav Round by 1.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Charged Bolts, Concussive Round, Grav Round and Full Auto by 25%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Charged Bolts, Concussive Round, Grav Round and Full Auto by 50%.
Reduces the pushback suffered while activating Charged Bolts, Concussive Round, Grav Round and Full Auto by 75%.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Full Auto and Demolition Round by 15%.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Full Auto and Demolition Round by 30%.

Fires a round that creates a gravity vortex on the target, dealing 1328 - 1495 kinetic damage, crushing the target's armor and reducing the armor raiting by 4% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times. Gravity vortices leave the target vulnerable to High Impact Bolt.
Stockstrike has a 50% chance to knock the target back several meters. In addition, Concussion Charge's Knockback effect is stronger and pushes enemies 2 meters further away.
Stockstrike has a 100% chance to knock the target back several meters. In addition, Concussion Charge's Knockback effect is stronger and pushes enemies 4 meters further away.
Charged Bolts and Grav Round have a 50% chance to build a Charged Barrier that reduces damage taken by 2% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
Charged Bolts and Grav Round have a 100% chance to build a Charged Barrier that reduces damage taken by 2% for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
While Armor-piercing Cell is active, critical hits with rounds and Full Auto have 50% chance to generate 1 energy cell. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
While Armor-piercing Cell is active, critical hits with rounds and Full Auto have 100% chance to generate 1 energy cell. This effect cannot occur more than once every 3 seconds.
Grav Round now applies an additional gravity vortex.
Reduces the cooldown of Concussion Charge by 5 seconds and Tenacity by 15 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Concussion Charge by 10 seconds and Tenacity by 30 seconds.
Recharge Cells regenerates 7% of your maximum health over 10 seconds.
Grav Round grants Charged Barrel, increasing the damage dealt by the next High Impact Bolt by 6%. Stacks up to 5 times.
Increase the damage dealt by Full Auto by 33%.
Full Auto has a 50% chance to slow the target's movement speed by 50% for 2 seconds.
Full Auto has a 100% chance to slow the target's movement speed by 50% for 2 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Concussive Round by 7.5 seconds and Reserve Powercell by 15 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Concussive Round by 15 seconds and Reserve Powercell by 30 seconds.
Charged Bolts and Grav Round have a 10% chance to finish the cooldown on Full Auto and increase the damage dealt by the next Full Auto by 25%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Charged Bolts and Grav Round have a 20% chance to finish the cooldown on Full Auto and increase the damage dealt by the next Full Auto by 25%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Charged Bolts and Grav Round have a 30% chance to finish the cooldown on Full Auto and increase the damage dealt by the next Full Auto by 25%. This effect cannot occur more than once every 6 seconds.
Fires a demolition round that explodes on contact, dealing (current weapon) kinetic damage. This damage is increased by 5% per gravity vortex on the target.
Increase ranged and tech accuracy by 1%.
Increase ranged and tech accuracy by 2%.
Increase ranged and tech accuracy by 3%.
You have a 50% chance to recharge 1 energy cell when stunned, immobilized, knocked down or otherwise incapacitated.
You have a 100% chance to recharge 1 energy cell when stunned, immobilized, knocked down or otherwise incapacitated.
Plasma Cell has a 50% chance when it applies its effects to reduce the movement speed of the target by 50% for 2 seconds.
Plasma Cell has a 100% chance when it applies its effects to reduce the movement speed of the target by 100% for 2 seconds.
Increases the damage dealt by the Plasma Cell by 10% and increases its chance to be triggered by 2%.
Increases the damage dealt by the Plasma Cell by 20% and increases its chance to be triggered by 4%.
Increases the damage dealt by the Plasma Cell by 30% and increases its chance to be triggered by 6%.
Increases stealth detection by 1, melee and raged defense by 1% and reduces the cooldown of Stealth Scan by 2.5 seconds.
Increases stealth detection by 2, melee and raged defense by 2% and reduces the cooldown of Stealth Scan by 5 seconds.
Launches an incendiary projectile, setting the target ablaze for (current weapon) elemental damage and an additional (current weapon) elemental damage over 18 seconds.

High Impact Bolt ignores 15% of the target's armor. In addition, if High Impact Bolt hits a burning target, it has a 50% chance to generate 1 energy cell and refresh the duraction of you Plasma Cell's burn effect if present.

High Impact Bolt ignores 30% of the target's armor. In addition, if High Impact Bolt hits a burning target, it has a 10% chance to generate 1 energy cell and refresh the duraction of you Plasma Cell's burn effect if present.
Reactive Shield has a 50% chance to remove all movement-impairing effects when activated.
Reactive Shield has a 100% chance to remove all movement-impairing effects when activated.
Charged Bolts has a 10% chance and Full Auto has a 20% chance to finish the cooldown on High Impact Bolt and make the next High Impact Bolt free.
Charged Bolts has a 20% chance and Full Auto has a 40% chance to finish the cooldown on High Impact Bolt and make the next High Impact Bolt free.
Charged Bolts has a 30% chance and Full Auto has a 60% chance to finish the cooldown on High Impact Bolt and make the next High Impact Bolt free.
Reduces the cooldown of Recharge Cells by 15 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown of Recharge Cells by 30 seconds.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Plasma Cell, High Impact Bolt, Incendiary Round and Assault Plastique by 15%.
Increases the critical bonus damage of Plasma Cell, High Impact Bolt, Incendiary Round and Assault Plastique by 30%.
Hammer Shot, Charged Bolts, High Impact Bolt, Full Auto and hail of Bolts deal 3% additional damage to burning targets.
Hammer Shot, Charged Bolts, High Impact Bolt, Full Auto and hail of Bolts deal 6% additional damage to burning targets.
Hammer Shot, Charged Bolts, High Impact Bolt, Full Auto and hail of Bolts deal 9% additional damage to burning targets.
When you take damage, you have 50% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Reactive Shield by 1.5. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
When you take damage, you have 100% chance to reduce the active cooldown of Reactive Shield by 3. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Increases tech critical chance by 1% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 10% on targets below 30% max health.
Increases tech critical chance by 2% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 20% on targets below 30% max health.
Increases tech critical chance by 3% and increases the damage dealt by periodic elemental effects by 30% on targets below 30% max health.
Critical hits have a 50% chance to reduce the active cooldown on Adrenaline Rush and Reserve Powercell by 3. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.
Critical hits have a 100% chance to reduce the active cooldown on Adrenaline Rush and Reserve Powercell by 6. This effect cannot occur more than once every 1.5 seconds.

Throws a moldable plastic explosive that sticks to the target and detonates after several seconds. Standard and weak enemies enter a state of panic while the explosive is active. The explosion deals (current weapon) kinectic damage when it detonates. Standard and weak targets are knocked back from teh blast. Shares a 15 second cooldown with Sticky Grenade.
